channel.description: Recent content in Etc on tanaike

item.title: Element's Duplicate Number in Array at Python
item.description:
Suddenly I had to need this.

This script can get the duplicate number of each element in array at Python. In this script, the duplicate number of each element is obtained and sorted by the duplicate number. This was expressed by the comprehension.

data = ['a', 'b', 'c', 'd', 'b', 'c', 'd', 'b', 'c', 'b']
result = sorted({i: data.count(i) for i in set(data)}.items(), key=lambda x: x[1], reverse=True)
print(result)

>>> [('b', 4), ('c', 3), ('d', 2), ('a', 1)]

item.title: CoffeeScript
item.description: I may be slow a bit, but I could notice much convenience of CoffeeScript just now. I didn’t know that scripts of GAS can be made by CoffeeScript up until now. This will have me work more effectively! :D

item.title: 1stpost
